content.title: Shri Vajpayee Bankable Yojana
content.department: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
content.beneficiary: Unemployed persons, including disabled and blind persons
content.details: This scheme aims to supply self-employment to unemployed persons in urban and rural areas. Disabled and blind persons are also eligible to take benefits under this scheme.
benefits: Maximum Limit for Bank Loan: ₹.8.00 lakh for the Industries sector, ₹.8.00 lakh for the Service sector, ₹.8.00 lakh for the Business sector.
Rate of subsidy on the loan amount varies by area and category.
Maximum Limit of Subsidy: ₹.1,25,000/- for a blind or handicapped person.
eligibility: Qualification: The applicant should have passed the minimum standard fourth OR should have undergone training for a minimum of three months from a private establishment or a minimum of one month from Government recognized Institutes, in the area of the proposed business or should have experience of minimum 1 year in the same activity or should be a hereditary craftsperson.
exclusions: Meat processing/canning and/or selling or serving.
Crops / Arable Farming / Fisheries / Pig Rearing Centre.
Any project that creates environmental problems or is prohibited by law.
content.application_process: Online and Offline. Visit the official website https://blp.gujarat.gov.in/header_home.php for registration and application.
documents_required: Proof of details of the applicant.

faqs.question: What is Shri Vajpayee Bankable Yojana?
faqs.answer: The scheme aims to provide self-employment to unemployed persons in urban and rural areas of Gujarat. A disabled or blind person can also benefit from this scheme.

faqs.question: How much educational qualification is required in Shri Vajpayee Bankable Yojana?
faqs.answer: At least Class-IV (four) pass or Training/Experience: Must have at least 3 months of training from a private institution appropriate to the profession or at least one month of training from a government recognized institution OR one year of relevant experience in the trade OR should be a heritage craftsman.

faqs.question: What Is The Age Limit For Loan In Shree Vajpayee Bankable Yojana?
faqs.answer: Applicant's age limit should be between 18 years to 65 years.

faqs.question: What Is The Maximum Limit Of Loan Facility Through Bank?
faqs.answer: B.L.P. Through the portal, the applicant can avail loans up to 8 lakhs for industry/services/trade sector.

faqs.question: Which businesses are not supported under Re Vajpayee Bankable Yojana?
faqs.answer: Meat processing/canning and/or selling or serving, intoxicants manufacturing/storage/sale, crops/arable farming/fisheries/pig rearing centre, and any project that creates environmental problems or is prohibited by law.
